name: Earth Angel
description:
Background.

The world is full of evil these days,...well, we all know that, luckly us, the divine force has send an angel down to earth to protect ,guide her against the horde of demons.

Controls.

mouse to move and attack

wheel to zoom in and out

Metagame.

Escape own mental loops. Circle out in perfect armony enjoying the paradise in earth, after bad mood is removed from the innerself.
